Filter menu outer description info: Sign identifying information
VariableDefinition: An English word that uniquely identifies each entry in the data set

Filter menu outer description info: Sign identifying information
VariableDefinition: An English word that uniquely identifies each lemma collapsing across phonological and inflectional variants

Filter menu outer description info: Sign identifying information
VariableDefinition: A code that uniquely identifies each video in the database

Filter menu outer description info: Sign identifying information
VariableDefinition: A code that uniquely identifies each video in the database

Filter menu outer description info: Sign identifying information
VariableDefinition: A code that uniquely identifies each video in the database

Filter menu outer description info: Sign identifying information
VariableDefinition: A code that uniquely identifies each video in the database

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: English based word frequency retrieved from SubtlexUS (Log10 frequency per million)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean subjective frequency rating for all deaf ASL signers (1 = very infrequent, 7=very frequent)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean subjective frequency rating standard deviation (all deaf ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized subjective frequency rating (Z-score) (all deaf ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Number of deaf ASL signers on which Sign Frequency M (all) is based

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Proportion of deaf signing participants who did not know or recognize the sign (out of all deaf ASL participants)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean subjective frequency rating for deaf native ASL signers (1 = very infrequent, 7=very frequent)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean subjective frequency rating standard deviation (deaf native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized subjective frequency rating (Z-score) (deaf native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Number of participants on which Sign Frequency M (native) is based

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Percentage of participants who did not know the sign (deaf native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean subjective frequency rating for deaf non-native ASL signers (1 = very infrequent, 7=very frequent)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean subjective frequency rating standard deviation (deaf non-native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized subjective frequency rating (Z-score) (deaf non-native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Number of participants on which Sign Frequency M (non-native) is based

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Percentage of participants who did not know the sign (deaf non-native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: The most common dominant English translation provided by deaf ASL signers

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Proportion agreement with the dominant English gloss among all deaf ASL signers

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Proportion agreement with the dominant English gloss among deaf native ASL signers

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: Proportion agreement with the dominant English gloss among deaf non-native ASL signers

Filter menu outer description info: The frequency of the sign and/or its English translation
VariableDefinition: The other English words provided by the signers (as first choice) for a given item that were not the dominant, most frequent word.

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean iconicity rating from hearing non-signers  (1=not iconic at all; 7=very iconic)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean iconicity rating standard deviation (hearing non-signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized iconicity rating (Z-score) (hearing non-signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Number of hearing non-signers on which Iconicity M is based

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: The English translation used to elicit iconicity ratings from non-signers. The value is blank if the EntryID was sufficient.

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean iconicity rating from all deaf ASL signers (1=not iconic at all; 7=very iconic)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean iconicity rating standard deviation (all deaf ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized iconicity rating (Z-score) (all deaf ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Number of deaf ASL signers  on which Iconicity M is based

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean iconicity rating from only deaf ASL signers (1=not iconic at all; 7=very iconic)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean iconicity rating standard deviation (deaf native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized iconicity rating (Z-score) (deaf native ASL signers)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Number of deaf native ASL signers on which Iconicity (M) is based

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: A measure of consistency (diversity) of guesses by hearing non-signers for each sign, where value of zero indicates perfect agreement

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Proportion of participants who guessed the correct meaning of the sign

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean transparency rating from hearing non-signers; participants guessed the meaning of the sign and rated how obvious the meaning would be to others (1=not obvious at all; 7=very obvious)

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean transparency rating standard deviation

Filter menu outer description info: The relationship between the sign form and its meaning
VariableDefinition: Mean standardized transparency rating (Z-score)

Filter menu outer description info: Lexical characteristics
VariableDefinition: The lexical class or a sign (Adjective, Adverb, Name, Noun, Number, Verb, and Minor: Preposition, Pronoun, Conjunction)

Filter menu outer description info: Lexical characteristics
VariableDefinition: Whether or not handshape of the sign is the first letter of the English translation

Filter menu outer description info: Lexical characteristics
VariableDefinition: Whether or not sign includes more than one letter of the manual alphabet.

Filter menu outer description info: Lexical characteristics
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the sign is a compound. Compounds are signs that include more than one free morpheme, and morpheme boundaries are often indicated by a change in selected fingers or major location.

Filter menu outer description info: Lexical characteristics
VariableDefinition: The number of coded multiple sequential units in a given sign over which phonological constraints (e.g., the number of locations, the number of combinations of selected fingers) apply.

Filter menu outer description info: Length of the sign in milliseconds
VariableDefinition: The sign onset (milliseconds)

Filter menu outer description info: Length of the sign in milliseconds
VariableDefinition: The sign offset (milliseconds)

Filter menu outer description info: Length of the sign in milliseconds
VariableDefinition: Duration of sign (milliseconds)

Filter menu outer description info: Length of the sign in milliseconds
VariableDefinition: Duration of video clip (milliseconds)

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: The unique combination of selected fingers, flexion, spread, thumb position, and thumb contact

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Fingers that are 1) moving, otherwise 2) fingers that are not fully flexed or fully extended, otherwise 3) fingers that are fully extended. Thumb is ignored unless it is the only selected finger in the sign

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Aperture of the selected fingers of the dominant hand at sign onset

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the aperture changes

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Spread of the selected fingers

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the spread changes

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Position of the thumb

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the thumb contacts the selected fingers

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Symmetry of the hands according to Battison's sign types

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Path movement of the first morpheme in the sign

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the movement (path movement, wrist twist, handshape change) repeats

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: General location of the dominant hand at sign onset

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Specific location of the dominant hand at sign onset

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Second specific location of the dominant hand in signs with a setting change

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the dominant contacts the major location (or the other hand in symmetrical signs)

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: The handshape of the nondominant hand

Filter menu outer description info: The phonological composition of the initial "morpheme"
VariableDefinition: Whether or not the wrist twists

VariableDefinition: Counts the frequency with which the Sign Type value occurs in the lexicon

Filter menu outer description info: A set of phonological calculations based on the phonological properties of signs in the lexicon
VariableDefinition: The number of neighbors that share either all or all but one of these phonological features: Sign Type, Minor Location, Movement, Contact with the Major Location, Selected Fingers, Thumb Position, Thumb Contact, Flexion, Flexion Change, Spread, Spread Change, Wrist Twist, Repeated Movement and Non-Dominant Handshape.

Filter menu outer description info: A set of phonological calculations based on the phonological properties of signs in the lexicon
VariableDefinition: The number of neighbors that share either all or all but one of these phonological features: Handshape, Major Location, and Path Movement

Filter menu outer description info: A set of phonological calculations based on the phonological properties of signs in the lexicon
VariableDefinition: Mean of the sign√ïs scaled sub-lexical properties

Filter menu outer description info: A set of phonological calculations based on the phonological properties of signs in the lexicon
VariableDefinition: Complexity is calculated as described in Morgan, Novogrodsky, and Sandler (2019) which incremented complexity by 1 if the sign is asymmetrical with a different handshape, violates the symmetry or dominance conditions, uses selected fingers other than index or index middle ring and pinky, uses stacked or crossed flexion, has two types of movement, has three types of movement

Filter menu outer description info: When the sign is acquired (see Caselli, Lieberman, & Pyers, 2020 for more information)
VariableDefinition: The age (in months) at which a sign is expected to be acquired estimated by identifying the minimum age (rounded to whole months) at which all children in an age group can produce the sign)
